member.name: T:OneSecondFrequencyAverager.OneSecondFrequencyAverager
member.summary: Represents an adapter that calculates the average of the input frequencies over each full second.

member.name: P:OneSecondFrequencyAverager.OneSecondFrequencyAverager.SupportsTemporalProcessing
member.summary: Gets a flag indicating whether this adapter supports temporal processing.
